bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.description: Cell: %%sqlflow SELECT * from creditcard.creditcard limit 5; Error message: <denchmark-code>UsageError: Cell magic `%%sqlflow` not found. </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: I don't reproduce this bug after <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/pull/2552/files>https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/sqlflow/pull/2552/files</denchmark-link> merged, so I closed this issue.
